channel.title: Loading A 601/602 Server Or Cache On A Lower Client
channel.description:
Ok I finally got the newly released (but totally blank) 601/602 server running, and it has become a major hassle with using localhost to see players and edit items and whatnot.
So my question is: Is there a way to load a 601 or 602 cache/server onto a lower client that is still hd (like 508 or 562) and not have to use XAMPP or localhost or MySQL? Like turning the way things run into something im more familiar with (502 to 582) but still using the new 601/602 data?
